ISSUE.TITLE: Support prompt on launch options in JT form
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ##### ISSUE TYPE - Feature Idea ##### SUMMARY Example: See mockups for more examples: https://tower-mockups.testing.ansible.com/patternfly/templates/templates-add/ Currently supported promptable fields: ask_scm_branch_on_launch ask_diff_mode_on_launch ask_variables_on_launch ask_limit_on_launch ask_tags_on_launch ask_skip_tags_on_launch ask_job_type_on_launch ask_verbosity_on_launch ask_inventory_on_launch ask_credential_on_launch
